subject: [Radiance-general] Radiance 3.4 archiv
body:

I took a look at the archive and verified that it unpacks directly -- is
it possible that you didn't get the whole thing?  Below are the correct
file sizes:

7263349 Jan 30 09:32 rad3R4.tar.gz
1894244 Jan 30 11:24 radbin_lnx.tar.gz
55532163 Jan 30 11:14 radbin_lnx_static.tar.gz
